title: I Kiss The Movie Emperor To Continue My Life - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Acting   Celebrities   Charming Protagonist   Couple Growth   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Determined Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Kind Love Interests   Manly Gay Couple   Misunderstandings   Models   Modern Knowledge   Movies   Popular Love Interests   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Straight Uke   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Duke Of Butterflies   照破山河   蝴蝶公爵
description:
Chen Zhi has a disease, and it can only be cured by either kissing or hugging. Unluckily, this doesn't work with anyone expect Ding Zhan. Well, here’s good news and a bad news. Good news is Ding Zhan is willing to help with a compassionate spirit. However, bad news is that, their fans for some or various reason are tearing each other apart. 

Later, Ding Zhan holds an event which has an activity, and that is to show the recent group photo that was taken and saved in his phone. As soon as he opens his phone, a rice ball star’s message pops up.

Ding-Dong, your little baby/Chen Zhi is bubbling.>
